FuncDef: The display vsi name statistics command displays statistics of a specified VSI, such as the PWs and AC interfaces in different states.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VSI whose statistics are to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: AC                     : 1 up, 0 down, 1 AC OAM down
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view statistics such as the PWs and AC interfaces of a specified VSI, run the display vsi statistics command.
